items.text: squeezes this down to long-on, past the diving short midwicket fielder
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: slices the drive to deep cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, 1 run

items.text: too full, driven hard to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, 1 run

items.preText: For those asking, South Africa's highest successful chase in the last three years is the 282 for no loss they made to smash Bangladesh in January 2017. De Kock and Amla made hundreds there
items.text: length ball on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: punched down to mid-off, was looking to force this on the up through cover.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Markram, 1 run

items.text: half-chance at midwicket but can't get a hand to it. Faf will be relieved. Mashrafe bangs it in, not good enough at 120kph, Faf pulls and just eludes the leaping fielder.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, FOUR runs

items.text: works this down to mid-on as they hare across
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: punches to mid-on, they complete the run again
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Markram, 1 run

items.text: works this down to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: turns this into the leg side as they scamper a quick single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: tapped wide of cover, this one kept a touch low
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, 1 run

items.text: skids one straight on, punched to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, no run

items.text: drilled down to Tamim at long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: too much flight, belted down the ground but straight to long-on again
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, 1 run

items.text: gentle push down the ground to long-on, five singles of that over.

items.text: stands tall and punches to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: sliding down leg, works this down to fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Markram, 1 run

items.text: pristine drive! Slower, fuller and Faf crashes this between cover and mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, FOUR runs

items.text: width and he slaps this to the cover boundary. Mind you, there was a sweeper who was no more than 10 yards away but the ball just kept going away from him. First one off the frontfoot, now off the backfoot. Superb from Faf
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, FOUR runs

items.text: turns this full delivery from outside off to midwicket

items.text: works this to midwicket

items.text: eases the drive to deep point

items.text: gentle dab into the point region as they steal a quick single

items.text: eases this past the bowler to long-off

items.text: goes right back and across as he turns this in-drifter to the leg side
